fields.name: 2 random players are picked, then one of the following happens:
fields.value:
- 1st gives $200 to 2nd.
- 1st gives $400 to 2nd.
- 1st gives $600 to 2nd.
- 1st gives 1 random property to 2nd.
- 1st gives 2 random properties to 2nd.
- 1st gives 3 random properties to 2nd.
- Swap their money.
- Swap their properties.
- Swap everything.
